name: Populous: The Beginning
description: Installer for the community developed beta version
content:
custom-name: 'Populous: beta'
files:
- matchmaker:
    filename: popmm.exe
    referer: https://www.popre.net/downloads.php?f=0
    url: https://www.popre.net/files/popmm.exe
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/Program Files/Populous Reincarnated/MatchMaker/Matchmaker.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    args: /silent /nogui
    executable: matchmaker
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
requires: populous-the-beginning-change-me-2
